mapper.select: SELECT A.feed_id AS feedId, A.contents, A.location, A.created_at AS createdAt, B.user_id AS writerId , IF(B.nick_name IS NULL, B.uid, B.nick_name) AS writerNm , B.uid, B.pic AS writerPic FROM feed A INNER JOIN user B ON A.writer_user_id = B.user_id ORDER BY feed_id DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{size}
